title: Netflix GPT
description: An AI-powered Netflix clone built with React, Tailwind, Firebase, and TMDB's API for recommendations.

title: AI Trip Planner
description: An AI-powered trip planner built with React and Tailwind, generating custom itineraries via Gemini AI, with Firebase storage.

title: GameListing App
description: A game listing app which uses React JS and Tailwind, with RAWG API and search functionality.
